price: Ese (mwa bantu mwe!) mbabwire abo amashitani amanukiraho?
arabic: هَلۡ أُنَبِّئُكُمۡ عَلَىٰ مَن تَنَزَّلُ ٱلشَّيَٰطِينُ

version.title: Kinyarwanda Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Kinyarwanda by The Rwanda Muslims Association team.

meta.transliteration: hal unabbi-ukum ʿalā man tanazzalu al-shayāṭīnu
